vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.23.36
§ Bani = "built"
1) a Gadite, one of David's mighty warriors
2) a Levite of the line of Merari, and forefather to Ethan
3) a man of Judah of the line of Pharez
4) "children of Bani" returned from captivity with Zerubbabel
5) one or up to three Levites in Nehemiah's time
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   guerrero; de Gad; en tiempos de David; (b)   hijo de Sémer; ancestro de Etán; tribu de Leví; (c)   ancestro de Utai; descendiente de Fares; tribu de Judá; (d) ֶבִּנְוּי   jefe(s) de familia; post exílico; (e)   descendiente de Baní; casado con una esposa extranjera; post exílico; (f)   varios hombres
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴尼 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "建立"
1) 一位迦得人, 大衛的大能勇士之一(撒下 23:36)
2) 一位利未支派米拉利家族的人, 以探的祖先(代上 6:46)
3) 一位法勒斯家族的猶大人 (代上 9:4)
4) 和所羅巴伯一同由被擄之地歸回的"巴尼的子孫"們
5) 在尼希米時代, 舊約中所記載的有一至三人叫此名
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
巴尼 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "建立"
1) 一位迦得人, 大卫的大能勇士之一(撒下 23:36)
2) 一位利未支派米拉利家族的人, 以探的祖先(代上 6:46)
3) 一位法勒斯家族的犹大人 (代上 9:4)
4) 和所罗巴伯一同由被掳之地归回的"巴尼的子孙"们
5) 在尼希米时代, 旧约中所记载的有一至三人叫此名

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.6.46;
son of: Shemer (H8106);
father of: Amzi (H0557)
§ Bani = "built"
1) a Gadite, one of David's mighty warriors
2) a Levite of the line of Merari, and forefather to Ethan
3) a man of Judah of the line of Pharez
4) "children of Bani" returned from captivity with Zerubbabel
5) one or up to three Levites in Nehemiah's time

A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at 1Ch.9.4;
father of: Imri (H0566)
§ Bani = "built"
1) a Gadite, one of David's mighty warriors
2) a Levite of the line of Merari, and forefather to Ethan
3) a man of Judah of the line of Pharez
4) "children of Bani" returned from captivity with Zerubbabel
5) one or up to three Levites in Nehemiah's time

3) a man of Judah of the line of Pharez
4) "children of Bani" returned from captivity with Zerubbabel
5) one or up to three Levites in Nehemiah's time

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Neh.8.7; also called Binnui at Neh.10.9; 12.8;
Also named: bin.nuy (בִּנּוּי "Binnui" H1131L)
§ Bani = "built"
1) a Gadite, one of David's mighty warriors
2) a Levite of the line of Merari, and forefather to Ethan
3) a man of Judah of the line of Pharez
4) "children of Bani" returned from captivity with Zerubbabel
5) one or up to three Levites in Nehemiah's time

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.10; also called Binnui at Neh.7.15;
Also named: bin.nuy (בִּנּוּי "Binnui" H1131)
§ Bani = "built"
1) a Gadite, one of David's mighty warriors
2) a Levite of the line of Merari, and forefather to Ethan
3) a man of Judah of the line of Pharez
4) "children of Bani" returned from captivity with Zerubbabel
5) one or up to three Levites in Nehemiah's time
